name: MPRemoteCommandCenter
desc: An object that responds to remote control events sent by external accessories and system controls.

items.name: class func shared() -> MPRemoteCommandCenter
items.desc: Returns the shared object you use to access the systemâ€™s remote command objects.

items.name: var pauseCommand: MPRemoteCommand
items.desc: The command object for pausing playback of the current item.

items.name: var playCommand: MPRemoteCommand
items.desc: The command object for starting playback of the current item.

items.name: var stopCommand: MPRemoteCommand
items.desc: The command object for stopping playback of the current item.

items.name: var togglePlayPauseCommand: MPRemoteCommand
items.desc: The command object for toggling between playing and pausing the current item.

items.name: var nextTrackCommand: MPRemoteCommand
items.desc: The command object for selecting the next track.

items.name: var previousTrackCommand: MPRemoteCommand
items.desc: The command object for selecting the previous track.

items.name: var changeRepeatModeCommand: MPChangeRepeatModeCommand
items.desc: The command object for changing the repeat mode.

items.name: var changeShuffleModeCommand: MPChangeShuffleModeCommand
items.desc: The command object for changing the shuffle mode.

items.name: var changePlaybackRateCommand: MPChangePlaybackRateCommand
items.desc: The command object for changing the playback rate of the current media item.

items.name: var seekBackwardCommand: MPRemoteCommand
items.desc: The command object for seeking backward through a single media item.

items.name: var seekForwardCommand: MPRemoteCommand
items.desc: The command object for seeking forward through a single media item.

items.name: var skipBackwardCommand: MPSkipIntervalCommand
items.desc: The command object for playing a previous point in a media item.

items.name: var skipForwardCommand: MPSkipIntervalCommand
items.desc: The command object for playing a future point in a media item.

items.name: var changePlaybackPositionCommand: MPChangePlaybackPositionCommand
items.desc: The command object for changing the playback position in a media item.

items.name: var ratingCommand: MPRatingCommand
items.desc: The command object for rating a media item.

items.name: var likeCommand: MPFeedbackCommand
items.desc: The command object for indicating that a user likes what is currently playing.

items.name: var dislikeCommand: MPFeedbackCommand
items.desc: The command object for indicating that a user dislikes what is currently playing.

items.name: var bookmarkCommand: MPFeedbackCommand
items.desc: The command object for indicating that a user wants to remember a media item.

items.name: var enableLanguageOptionCommand: MPRemoteCommand
items.desc: The command object for enabling a language option.

items.name: var disableLanguageOptionCommand: MPRemoteCommand
items.desc: The command object for disabling a language option
